title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Narrative-Based Program for Workplace Change Experience and Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic job experience in medical/legal/technical fields and foundational understanding of organizational change
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can structure and explain planned/unplanned workplace change cases through narrative frameworks
Learners can analyze the impact of physical/emotional factors occurring during change processes on learning outcomes
Learners can develop individual and team-level response strategies for future changes based on organizational change experiences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
